text: vah vahee (khuda) hai jo tumhen raat ko (neend mein ek tarah par duniya se) utha leta he aur jo kuchh toone din ko kiya hai jaanata hai phir tumhen din ko utha kar khada karata hai taaki (zindagee kee) (vah) miyaad jo (usake ilm mein) muayyun hai pooree kee jae phir (to aakhir) tum sabako usee kee taraph lautana hai phir jo kuchh tum (duniya mein bhala bura) karate ho tumhen bata dega
